title: Code of Conduct
description: Ethical guidelines and behavioral standards for all CCEA members
content:
# CCEA Code of Conduct

This document outlines our commitment to maintaining high ethical standards in all CCEA activities.

## Core Principles

1. Integrity
2. Respect
3. Inclusivity
4. Transparency

## Guidelines

All members are expected to:
- Maintain professional conduct
- Respect diverse viewpoints
- Uphold academic integrity
- Protect confidential information
